messages.content: What is the current status of pfaeff-comfyui?
The current status of pfaeff-comfyui is a work in progress.

To install pfaeff-comfyui, follow these steps: 1. Clone the repository using `git clone https://github.com/Pfaeff/pfaeff-comfyui.git` in the `ComfyUI/custom_nodes/` directory. 2. Restart ComfyUI, and the installation of dependencies should happen automatically. Please note that this installation process has not been tested yet.
What are the available example workflows for SDXL pixel art in pfaeff-comfyui?
pfaeff-comfyui provides two example workflows for SDXL pixel art: 1. SDXL Pixelart workflow with background removal. 2. Aspect ratio preserving SDXL Pixelart workflow.
How can I use the example workflows for SDXL pixel art in pfaeff-comfyui?
To use the example workflows for SDXL pixel art in pfaeff-comfyui, simply drag one of the provided images into ComfyUI after installation.
What does the SDXL Pixelart workflow with background removal do?
The SDXL Pixelart workflow with background removal is an example workflow in pfaeff-comfyui that demonstrates how to remove the background from pixel art images using the SDXL model.
What does the Aspect ratio preserving SDXL Pixelart workflow do?

The Aspect ratio preserving SDXL Pixelart workflow is an example workflow in pfaeff-comfyui that demonstrates how to maintain the aspect ratio of pixel art images while processing them with the SDXL model.
Where can I find the example workflow images for SDXL pixel art in pfaeff-comfyui?

The example workflow images for SDXL pixel art in pfaeff-comfyui can be found in the 'workflows' directory of the cloned repository. The specific file paths are 'workflows/SDXL_pixelart.png' and 'workflows/SDXL_pixelart_preserve_aspect_ratio.png'.
